model.hed: Ariana Grande's Next Album Will Be Light on the Heartbreak, Heavy on the Girl Power
model.body:
We finally got the low-down on [Ariana Grande](http://www.teenvogue.com/tag/ariana-grande)’s third studio album in just as many years, and thank goodness, because between her cryptic tweets and not-so-subtle [“hints,](http://www.musictimes.com/articles/44883/20150807/ariana-grande-new-album-moonlight-single-focus-on-me.htm)" the “One Less Problem” starlet has been painting a pretty vague picture of what the tracks will be about. But Ariana recently sat down with *Scream Queens* creator Ryan Murphy for [her *V Magazine* profile](http://www.vmagazine.com/site/content/4875/ariana-grande-is-the-scream-dream) — and if anyone could get the dirt on what's *really* going to be on her next album, it's Ryan. 

Ariana says that the album is “vulnerable” and “terrifying,” because it's the most personal music she’s come out with so far. Naturally, you’d assume there would be some bonafide breakup anthems included in the lineup, but, uh, you’d be wrong. As she told Murphy: “You know, people found out quite a while after it actually happened. By the time I was writing the new album, I had kind of moved on. It’s not going to be captured on the album too much. I’m in a happy place. There aren’t any breakup anthems because I had moved on. I was like, alright.” 

It was only a few weeks ago that Ariana teased that the album would be available in October (later confirmed) and by her standards, that’s not too far away:


[#twitter: https://twitter.com/ArianaGrande/status/639192040778010624]

[#twitter: https://twitter.com/ArianaGrande/status/639193922393128962]

Ultimately, what we can piece together is that this album, and this moment, is going to be all about Ariana, and the rumored lead single “Focus On Me,” will probably be out on October 30. We may not have the broken-heart ballads we dreamed of, but we’re likely going to get some girl power anthems instead. Ariana’s not here to give us what we want, she’s here to give us what we need.

[#twitter: https://twitter.com/ArianaGrande/status/644001022919188480]

__Related:__ [Ariana Grande Covered Justin Bieber's "What Do You Mean?" in Concert and It Will Be Your Everything](http://www.teenvogue.com/story/ariana-grande-covers-justin-bieber-live)

__Check this out:__ 


[#cnevideo: /cnevideos/55847f7afb1995762be47c76]||||||
model.socialTitle: Ariana Grande's Next Album Will Be Light on the Heartbreak, Heavy on the Girl Power
model.seoTitle: Ariana Grande Reveals What's On Her Next Album
model.seoDescription: She spoke to "Scream Queens" creator Ryan Murphy about

fields.name: Brianna Wiest
fields.bio:
__What sort of advice would you give to your 18-year-old self?__
Don't worry so much, but don't slow down either. One day you'll be thinking of what to tell your 18-year-old self because Teen Vogue wants to know and suddenly a lot of things will seem worth it. 

__What's your go-to karaoke song?__
Right now, the "Jealous" remix by Nick J. and Tinashe. 

__If your house was on fire and you could only save five things what would they be?__
My cat, bag, laptop, memory box (journals are inside) and favorite shoes. (That's all I really need either way.)

__What's the best piece of advice you've ever received?__
Easy does it. 

__What's a goal you have for the end of the year?__
To be able to cook things l like even more than I like ordering out.

inline.title: Behind the Scenes of Ariana Grande's Teen Vogue Cover Shoot
inline.description: Watch a bonus interview with Ariana Grande on the set of her Teen Vogue photo shoot.

contributorsAuthor.name: Brianna Wiest
